arts.ttl: Bayern Munich confirm Florian Wirtz interest ahead of summer transfer battle
arts.sum: Bayern Munich are set to battle clubs from the Premier League and Europe for the signature of Florian Wirtz in the summer transfer window. The Bayer Leverkusen star will be one of the most sought-after players this year after a couple of outstanding seasons in the Bundesliga. Wirtz was key to Leverkusen’s success in 2023/24 […] The post Bayern Munich confirm Florian Wirtz interest ahead of summer transfer battle first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Matthäus: Rummenigge's Wirtz comments "a slap in the face" for Musiala
arts.sum: The fact that Karl-Heinz Rummenigge recently described Florian Wirtz as Germany's best player is "a slap in the face" for Jamal Musiala, according to Lothar Matthäus.

arts.ttl: Alonso reacts to heated argument between Boniface and Buendia
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso has had his say on the scuffle that broke out between Victor Boniface and Emiliano Buendia towards the end of Bayer Leverkusen's 4-1 win over Eintracht Frankfurt

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Eintracht Frankfurt 1-4 Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: A commanding performance from Bayer Leverkusen as they beat Eintracht Frankfurt 4-1 at the Waldstadion to stay within eight points of Bayern Munich. The game started off very lively but…

arts.ttl: Aleix García masterclass enables Bayer Leverkusen to cruise to victory over Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen secured a statement 4-1 victory away at Eintracht Frankfurt in the Bundesliga, with goals from Nathan Tella, Nordi Mukiele, Patrik Schick and Aleix García consolidating a dominant performance all over the pitch. The visitors' dominance was underlined in the 62nd minute when Aleix García Serrano scored a stunning goal from the edge of the box, effectively sealing the victory.

Bayer Leverkusen delivered a ruthless first-half performance, striking three times in just seven minutes, to leave hosts Eintracht Frankfurt reeling with a 4-1 victory in the Bundesliga on Saturday. Leverkusen maintained their dominance in the second half, with Aleix García delivering a low long shot in the 62nd minute, following a clearance, that nestled into the far lower corner to seal the fourth and final goal of the night.

arts.ttl: 5 reasons why Bayern Munich will progress against Bayer Leverkusen in the UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Bayern Munich host Bayer Leverkusen at the Allianz Arena in the first leg of their UEFA Champions League last 16 tie on Wednesday 5 March with the goals of Harry Kane, plus their outstanding form and European track record firmly in Bayern's favour. Their home Bundesliga form this season reads a near impeccable 11 wins and one draw in 12 matches, while they are also unbeaten in Munich in the Champions League - suggesting Bayern have a great chance of securing an advantage in the first leg.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen outclass Frankfurt in convincing away win
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen picked up a 4-1 win on the road against Eintracht Frankfurt thanks to goals from Nathan Tella, Nordi Mukiele, Patrik Schick and Aleix Garcia.

arts.ttl: Karl-Heinz Rummenigge: "Wirtz is the best player in Germany for me"
arts.sum: Karl-Heinz Rummenigge has stated that Florian Wirtz should be Bayern München's main target.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: The lineups have been announced ahead of Saturday's Topspiel between Eintracht Frankfurt and Bayer Leverkusen.
